========
API Data
========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/api_data.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/api_data

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/mikeasilva/api_data.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/mikeasilva/api_data

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/api-data/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://api-data.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




API Data makes working with open data APIs easy.


* Free software: GNU General Public License v3
* Documentation: https://api-data.readthedocs.io.
